channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Save a staggering 40% off the Nitro Deck+, an essential Nintendo Switch accessory and the perfect handheld gaming companion
item.description: Still play your Switch? Don't leave for the Holidays without buying the essential Nitro Deck+ at a stunning 40% off this Black Friday.

item.title: The best Ring doorbell deals this Black Friday – save up to 61% off the latest models
item.description: I've combed through all today's deals on Ring doorbells and cameras to bring you this curated list of the very best.

item.title: Sonos Black Friday deals are officially here, with awesome speaker prices and a major Arc Ultra soundbar discount
item.description: Get big Black Friday discounts on Sonos' speakers and soundbars, from the Roam to the Arc Ultra

item.title: The First ‘Sunrise on the Reaping’ Trailer Teases a Bigger, Meaner ‘Hunger Games’
item.description: There's another 'Hunger Games' movie back doing what the series does best with November 2026's 'Sunrise on the Reaping.'

item.title: I’m officially done with YouTube Kids
item.description: The details are fuzzy, but I think my husband and I downloaded the YouTube Kids app to our TV sometime in 2022, when between one and three members of the household came down with the flu at the same time. Like countless parents of toddlers before us, we needed something, anything, that would buy us […]

item.title: China’s PlushDaemon group uses EdgeStepper implant to infect network devices with SlowStepper malware in global supply-chain attacks
item.description: ESET says PlushDaemon can ploy SlowStepper malware against targets anywhere in the world.

item.title: Want to make the most of Fortnite Festival? The Riffmaster guitar controller is heavily discounted in the US and UK
item.description: These Black Friday deals take the PDP Riffmaster down to a low price, with significant savings whether you're in the US or the UK. Here's where to pick it up.

item.title: Forget Beijing, it’s US shopping apps that are sucking up your privacy − and Amazon is the most data-hungry
item.description: Surfshark's latest research warns that US apps are outstripping Chinese apps in data collection. Here's all you need to know.

item.title: Protection des mineurs : PornHub veut confier la vérification d’âge à votre smartphone
item.description: Plutôt que multiplier les contrôles d’identité sur chaque site, Aylo (le groupe derrière PornHub) plaide pour une vérification directement au niveau du smartphone ou de l’ordinateur.

item.title: BYD augmente fortement l’autonomie de sa petite voiture électrique, l’Atto 2
item.description: Avec sa nouvelle batterie, le BYD Atto 2 passe de 314 à 430 kilomètres d'autonomie WLTP. Une évolution intéressante pour cette voiture électrique, qui s'accompagne d'une recharge rapide et d'une dotation d'équipements revue à la hausse.

item.title: Republicans and Europe Agree: It’s Time to Make Life Easier for AI Companies
item.description: Trump's anti-regulation push seems to be bearing fruit globally.

item.title: Time to upgrade? Save $50 on the Apple Watch SE 3 with this handy Amazon Black Friday deal
item.description: One of the latest Apple Watch models just hit a record-low price this Black Friday.

item.title: Samsung Display, China’s BOE settle OLED patent and trade secret lawsuits
item.description: The settlement lays to bed a drawn out, three-year fight between Samsung’s display division and BOE, both of whom supply display panels used in Apple's iPhones.

item.title: Cdiscount dégaine de belles offres avec un nouveau code promo pour la Black Friday Week
item.description: La Black Friday Week vient de débuter chez Cdiscount, qui propose aussi une multitude d’offres sur des produits Tech. En prime, un code promo a été mis en place pour réduire davantage la facture, rendant cette période idéale pour réaliser de belles économies sur une large gamme d'articles.

item.title: Plus besoin de passer l’aspirateur : 3i casse les prix de ses meilleurs robots pour le Black Friday [Sponso]
item.description: Les promotions du Black Friday de la marque d’électroménager 3i sont lancées avec de grosses réductions sur deux de ses robots les plus populaires. Puissance, autonomie et intelligence : voici d'excellents aspirateurs-robot accessibles dès 218 euros.

item.title: Comment transformer votre PC en console avec Playnite (et sa nouvelle mise à jour)
item.description: Vous en avez marre d'avoir cinquante icônes sur votre bureau entre Steam, Epic Games et Battle.net ? C'est l'enfer du joueur PC moderne. La solution s'appelle Playnite, un logiciel open source brillant qui unifie tout ça. Sa version 10.44 vient de sortir, et même si elle ne révolutionne pas tout, elle rend l'outil encore pratique.

item.title: Black Friday Week et gaming vont de paire avec -800 € sur ce laptop MSI Katana 15 équipé d’une RTX 5070 et d’un Core i7
item.description: Si vous cherchez une machine portable pour jouer, Boulanger propose le MSI Katana 15 à 1 299 euros au lieu de 2 099,99 euros grâce à un code promo pendant la Black Friday Week.

item.title: La France choisit AMD pour propulser le plus gros supercalculateur de son histoire
item.description: « Alice Recoque », le premier supercalculateur exaflopique basé en France, sera motorisé par des processeurs EPYC dans le cadre d'un partenariat conclu entre Eviden, le groupe français derrière ce superordinateur, et AMD.

item.title: Yet Another Study Shows That Most Companies Aren’t Making Any Money Off AI
item.description: Further proof has arrived that the ROI on AI is essentially non-existent.

item.title: The Best Google Pixel Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Here’s a guide to all the models—plus Pixel case recommendations and smart software tricks to try.

item.title: Leica’s latest black-and-white-only camera is the $7,800 Q3 Monochrom
item.description: Leica is announcing a Q3 Monochrom, its latest digital camera that captures only black-and-white photos and video. In many ways, the Q3 Monochrom is the same as a standard Q3, but with its 60-megapixel sensor modified to not record color, and dressed up in a stealthier logo-less design. It’s available today for $7,790, a $1,055 […]

item.title: Leica’s Q3 Monochrom costs thousands and only shoots black-and-white, but that’s only made me want one more
item.description: Leica has officially unveiled its latest fixed-lens compact camera, and it's a Monochrom edition of 2023's outstanding Q3.

item.title: Tome's founders ditch viral presentation app with 20M users to build AI-native CRM Lightfield
item.description: Lightfield, a customer relationship management platform built entirely around artificial intelligence, officially launched to the public this week after a year of quiet development — a bold pivot by a startup that once had 20 million users and $43 million in the bank building something completely different.The San Francisco-based company is positioning itself as a fundamental reimagining of how businesses track and manage customer relationships, abandoning the manual data entry that has defined CRMs for decades in favor of a system that automatically captures, organizes, and acts on customer i...

item.title: Ce compact Leica en noir et blanc va faire craquer les puristes de la photo
item.description: Leica annonce l'arrivée, ce jeudi, de la déclinaison monochrome de son Leica Q3. Au programme, un nouvel appareil photo compact à grand capteur et avec une plage dynamique plus étendue.

item.title: Your next Google TV device could come with a remote powered by indoor light – and I'm definitely a fan
item.description: Ohsung Electronics and Epishine have partnered up to bring us a Google TV remote that doesn't need a battery.

item.title: Malicious free VPN extension makes a comeback
item.description: Two malicious extensions operating under the name of "Free Unlimited VPN" have been stealing users' data for years. In May 2025, they were removed for good, but a new version is now back lurking on the Chrome Store.

item.title: Brendan Carr’s FCC launches probe into BBC’s Trump edit
item.description: FCC chair Brendan Carr has reportedly written to the BBC, PBS, and NPR announcing an investigation into whether a controversial BBC documentary with a misleading edit of a Donald Trump speech was ever aired in the US. Breitbart obtained a copy of the letter, which hasn’t been shared publicly by either Carr or the FCC. […]

item.title: Verizon is laying off over 13,000 workers
item.description: Verizon is preparing to lay off more than 13,000 employees, or about 13 percent of its workforce. In a message to employees, Verizon CEO Dan Schulman says that the reductions come as part of plans to cut costs and “reorient” the company “around delivering for and delighting our customers,” as first reported by The Wall […]

item.title: Major Labels Team Up on New AI Streamer Where Users Slop-ify Songs: Report
item.description: The service will reportedly resemble Spotify, except users can "remake" songs with AI.

item.title: Matter 1.5 débarque : en plus des caméras, le standard gère maintenant les portes de garage et la charge bidirectionnelle des voitures électriques (V2G)
item.description: Après trois ans d'attente, la Connectivity Standards Alliance (CSA) vient de lâcher la mise à jour que tout le monde attendait : Matter 1.5. Les caméras de surveillance entrent enfin dans la danse. Sur le papier, c'est la fin des écosystèmes fermés.

item.title: Some Spotify fans are still experiencing a major app crashing problem – and there’s still no sign of a fix
item.description: Spotify users have been struck by an annoying app crashing problem that has left them without music for days –here's the latest news and a possible fix.

item.title: EcoFlow Stream AC Pro en promotion : arrêtez de donner votre électricité à Enedis
item.description: Marre d'offrir votre surplus solaire au réseau ? Pour ce Black Friday 2025, EcoFlow attaque le problème à la racine en baissant le prix de sa batterie Stream AC Pro de 21 %. C'est peut-être le moment de rentabiliser votre installation.

item.title: ESET your business on the path to success and save 30% off ESET with our exclusive code
item.description: Protect your business from evolving cyber threats

item.title: Les Copilot+ PC sont un peu plus joueurs
item.description: Les PC fonctionnant avec Windows sur Arm ont plein de qualités, mais ça galère toujours pour les jeux vidéo. Qualcomm et Microsoft améliorent tout de même les choses, à coups de nouveaux pilotes, d'optimisations et d’un support élargi pour certains jeux populaires.

item.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A - Mega Dimension DLC will add Mega Zeraora, but Game Freak says it 'might be a little difficult' to obtain
item.description: Game Freak has teased a brand new Mega-Evolved Pokémon ahead of the release of Pokémon Legends: Z-A's Mega Dimension expansion, but warns they might be a bit of a challenge to obtain.

item.title: Sisterhood of the Best Travel Pants: Best Travel Trousers (2025)
item.description: Travel pants that are tough enough to handle hangry moods and unplanned delays.

item.title: The FCC wants to roll back steps meant to stop a repeat of a massive telecom hack
item.description: After one of the biggest telecom hacks in US history, the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) moved to enforce strict standards on carriers' cybersecurity measures. On Thursday, the agency is set to vote to roll back those requirements, arguing they were an unnecessary overstep of its authority. The China-linked Salt Typhoon hack revealed last year impacted […]...

item.title: Organizational intelligence is the new priority in the AI era
item.description: AI isn’t your catalyst. Deep, accurate business context is. In recent conversations with customers and peers, I’m not hearing “Which AI model or tool should we pick?” I’m hearing “How do we operationalize AI across our critical workflows?”

item.title: 287 € pour marcher en travaillant : pourquoi le Walkingpad Z1 vaut le coup
item.description: Rester assis huit heures par jour, c'est fini. Amazon propose une réduction solide sur le Walkingpad Z1, un tapis compact capable de se faire oublier une fois votre session terminée.

item.title: ‘Hawk Tuah’ Girl Added to Lawsuit Over Alleged Crypto Memecoin Fraud
item.description: The suit claims that the HAWK coin was rigged from the start to inflate its value rapidly before crashing.

item.title: Trump administration wants to use federal power to challenge state AI laws
item.description: States trying to regulate AI could be overruled by Trump’s federal task force.

item.title: Your secret weapon against cleaning chores! Up to 50% off at Tineco this Black Friday
item.description: Your secret weapon against cleaning chores! Up to 50% off at Tineco this Black Friday

item.title: La Black Friday Week a officiellement débuté sur Amazon : voici les meilleures offres en DIRECT
item.description: C'est le lancement de la Black Friday Week sur Amazon, mais aussi chez d'autres e-commerçants comme Fnac, Darty, Boulanger ou encore Cdiscount, qui suivront le pas sous peu. C'est donc le bon moment pour faire une excellente affaire sur votre prochain smartphone, tablette, PC portable, TV, etc. Vous retrouverez les meilleures offres Tech en temps réel dans cet article. ...

item.title: Les jouets dotés de l’IA déconseillés par des associations de défense des enfants
item.description: Ils sont mignons, voire câlins, et promettent d’apprendre et de tenir compagnie, mais les jouets dotés d’intelligence artificielle ne sont pas sans danger pour les enfants, selon des associations de défense des enfants et des consommateurs qui exhortent les parents à ne pas les acheter pendant les fêtes de fin d’année.

item.title: La Black Friday Week sur les vélos électriques, tous à bicyclette avant le jour J : les meilleurs deals
item.description: Les offres du Black Friday Week sont toujours aussi attractives. Les vélos électriques bénéficient eux aussi de promotions et c'est ce que nous vous dévoilons dans notre sélection des meilleures promos sur les VAE.

item.title: Sortera is turning America’s scrap aluminum problem into cash
item.description: Sortera has developed an AI-guided system to sort scrap aluminum by specific grades. The startup is building a second sorting facility in Tennessee.

item.title: 60+ early Black Friday deals: Score huge discounts on MacBooks, Nintendo Switch 2, Keurig, and Garmin
item.description: We found the latest early Black Friday deals on Apple products, robot vacuums, headphones, power stations, Legos, and tons more goodies.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Get live updates on the latest sales, doorbusters, and deal drops
item.description: Get live updates on Black Friday sales. We found savings of $150 on Dyson Supersonic hair dryers and $300 on Samsung TVs.

item.description: Get the best DJI deal in the Amazon Black Friday sale. The DJI Mic Mini (2 TX + 1 RX + Charging Case) is on sale for over $90 off.

item.title: Nvidia’s rising stock price takes fellow chip giants along for ride as renewed AI enthusiasm fuels fresh rally
item.description: AMD, Arm, and Broadcom are among the chip companies whose shares are up in premarket trading after Nvidia’s earnings eased fears of an AI bubble. Yesterday, after the stock market’s closing bell, Nvidia Corporation (Nasdaq: NVDA) reported its Q3 2026 financials.

item.title: Quick! The Fitbit Charge 6 is at a record-low price right now – and it's one of our favorite fitness trackers
item.description: Save up to 40% on Fitbit Charge 6 in Amazon's huge Black Friday event.

item.title: Galaxy Watch : ces deux montres Samsung passent à leur tour vers Wear OS 6 avec la mise à jour One UI 8 Watch
item.description: Après les Galaxy Watch 8 lancées nativement sous la dernière version de One UI Watch, puis la Galaxy Watch 7, c'est au tour des Galaxy Watch 6 d'être mises à jour.

item.title: Finland’s NestAI lands €100M, partners with Nokia to build AI for defense applications
item.description: Finnish startup NestAI said it has raised €100 million to build "Europe's leading physical AI lab."

item.title: Bryan Fuller Still Has Hope For ‘Hannibal’ Season 4
item.description: Plus, the director of 'Goldeneye' issues a threat to Amazon on how to handle 'James Bond'.

item.title: Paradromics Gets FDA Approval to Trial Its Brain Implant in People
item.description: The Austin-based startup will test its high-bandwidth device to help restore speech in people with extremely limited movement.

item.title: ModRetro Chromatic Review: Chic and Durable
item.description: This Game Boy clone is an uncompromising approach to the ultimate gamer nostalgia. But there are better options out there.

item.title: 10 Best Early Black Friday Deals at Best Buy (2025)
item.description: The main event hasn't started, but Best Buy has already rolled out great deals on our favorite tech of the year.

item.title: Camera support could be the boost Matter needs
item.description: It's finally happening. Three years after Matter launched, the interoperability standard now includes the most popular smart home devices: cameras. The Matter 1.5 spec, announced today, adds support for all types of video cameras - from indoor and outdoor, wired and battery-powered cameras, to video doorbells, baby monitors, pet cams, and more. Matter support should […]...

item.title: Your next concert could be a house away
item.description: Reimagining house shows as the next frontier for artists, fans, and cities in an AI-saturated era. In a world where AI can churn out chart-toppers in seconds and ticketing algorithms treat fans like data points, we risk losing the soul of live music. But a quiet countermovement is making a comeback right in people’s living rooms, backyards and basements. ...

item.title: Black Friday 360 camera deals – my expert picks from DJI, GoPro, Insta360 and more
item.description: There are price cuts on all of the best 360 cameras from DJI, GoPro, Insta360 and more. Here are my top picks.

item.title: The best earbuds of 2025 just crashed to their lowest ever price –run for these Technics!
item.description: Technics' excellent EAH-AZ100 simply can't be bettered when it comes to audio quality, and at this all-new lowest-seen price, there's no better time if it's got to be the best…

item.title: La Black Friday Week s’attaque à la domotique avec des offres folles sur les airfryers, caméras, ampoules et sonnettes connectées
item.description: Air fryer, ampoules connectées ou caméras de surveillance… Les incontournables de la maison intelligente profitent déjà de réductions avant le Black Friday. C’est l’occasion parfaite de découvrir la domotique ou d’enrichir votre équipement grâce à notre sélection des meilleures offres du moment.

item.title: Beat the DJI ban over Black Friday — get the best-ever price on the DJI Mini 4K drone at Amazon
item.description: Get the best-ever price for the DJI Mini 4K drone. The DJI Mini 4K drone is on sale for $239 in the Amazon Black Friday sale.
